essential plays


			[@ verses_1] verses ventures on
			
				#
				#	[ ] start the reverse proxy
				#		
				#			https://treasure.1.verses
				#			https://treasure.2.verses
				#			https://treasure.3.verses
				#	
				#	[ ] 
				#
				#
			
			[@ verses_1] verses ventures off		
		
			[@ verses_1] verses treasures inventory
	
			[@ verses_1] verses treasures save --name "treasure.1" --version 1.0.0
				#
				#	This doesn't delete the treasure. 
				#	To delete, just use "rm" or something.
				#
 
				#
				#	* search for "treasure.1" in the "treasures"
				#	* search for "treasure.py" in "treasure.1"
				#	* import "treasure" from "treasure.py"
				#
	
				#
				#	EQ check:
				#		* send tar file to trends
				#		* receive tar file from trends to temporary
				#
	
			[@ verses_1] verses treasures receive --name "treasure.1" --version 1.0.0
			
			
	
			[@ verses_1] verses trends inventory
	
			[@ verses_1] verses trends search --name "treasure"
